input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Majestic Stephen Curry Golden State Warriors Mens Blue Jersey Name and Number Hoodie

Item keywords:
Screen Printed Graphics
Comfortable Fit
Bright Team Colors
Officially Licensed by National Basketball Association
80% Cotton/20% Polyester
input_text.Response A: This magnificent Majestic Stephen Curry Golden State Warriors Men's Blue Jersey Name and Number Hoodie is the perfect way to show your team spirit and support for your favorite player. Made with 80% cotton and 20% polyester, this comfortable fit hoodie is perfect for everyday wear. The bright team colors and screen-printed graphics make this hoodie a great way to show your team pride, while the officially licensed by National Basketball Association designation ensures that you are getting a high-quality product. Whether you're wearing it to a game or just showing off your team spirit, this hoodie is sure to impress.
input_text.Response B: You will look like the #1 fan when you wear this Majestic Stephen Curry Golden State Warriors Blue Jersey Name and Number Hooded Sweatshirt! This comfortable hoodie features bright team colors, a large team logo across the chest, and Stephen Curry's name and number printed on the back. Made of 80% cotton/20% polyester and is officially licensed by the National Basketball Association.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.factors_a: They read like AI generated descriptions, rather than a interesting product description. I realise there is limited information, but copying the title of the product verbatim makes is just read like a generated description.
label_annotations.factors_b: They read like AI generated descriptions, rather than a interesting product description. I realise there is limited information, but copying the title of the product verbatim makes is just read like a generated description.
